name: Personalized Notes
entries: At 14th level, you can tie in your own creativity into your shorthand. Whenever you use the Final Cast of a shorthand spell, you can apply one effect of your choice to the spell. The effect you pick must be able to affect the spell correctly

items: You can increase the level of the spell by one spell slot level.
You can impose disadvantage on the Saving Throw.
You have advantage on the spell attack roll
The duration of the spell is doubled.
